name: Somewhere: Behind The Stones
description:
This is a horror game made in 1 day.

Controls:

  • Move with W, A, S, and D
  • Jump with Space(Takes Stamina)
  • Sprint with Left Shift(Takes Stamina)
  • Interact with the Left Mouse Button/Left Click

How To Play:

You need to turn off all the radios in the cave. To know how many radios you have left there's a counter in the top right. If you run out of stamina you cant sprint.
